entry.source: {F812}Starving man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403601}I bumped into a demon the other day.{F801}I gave him a Red so he'd leave me{F801}alone...{F801}{F802}He wolfed it down pretty quick.{F801}I wonder how those taste...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Starving man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403601}I got surrounded by demons the other{F801}day when I was out scavenging in{F801}Shinjuku National Park.{F801}{F802}If I didn't have a handful of reds{F801}with me, I wouldn't be here talking{F801}to you now.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Starving man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403601}By the way, did I hear that there's{F801}a cafe in Shinjuku? I don't get out{F801}from underground much, so...{F801}{F802}If it's true, I wonder if there's any{F801}food left there. I always loved having{F801}a pastry with my morning coffee...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Starving man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403601}By the way, did I hear that there's{F801}a cafe in Shinjuku? I don't get out{F801}from underground much, so...{F801}{F802}If it's true, I wonder if there's any{F801}food left there. I always loved having{F801}a pastry with my morning coffee...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-518}{F813,1,412105}What is it, human? You seem puzzled.{F801}Does my presence here make you{F801}uncomfortable?{F801}{F802}Not that I care a fig for your feelings.{F801}But if you have a problem with me...{F801}By all means, let's hear it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-518}{F813,1,412105}What is it, human? You seem puzzled.{F801}Does my presence here make you{F801}uncomfortable?{F801}{F802}Not that I care a fig for your feelings.{F801}But if you have a problem with me...{F801}By all means, let's hear it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Starving man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403601}H-Hey, you think the rumor is true?{F801}Ashura-kai forbids it, so I don't{F801}really know, but...{F801}{F802}If... if I eat a red pill... Will I{F801}really turn into a demon?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Starving man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403601}H-Hey, you think the rumor is true?{F801}Ashura-kai forbids it, so I don't{F801}really know, but...{F801}{F802}If... if I eat a red pill... Will I{F801}really turn into a demon?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Starving man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403601}They haven't captured the guy who snuck{F801}into Shinjuku National Park yet, right?{F801}{F802}Lucky bastard... He must've stuffed{F801}himself on all the meat there...{F801}{F802}Maybe the Ashura-kai's security has{F801}some holes... Think I should try?{F801}

What if the Ring of Gaea{F801}defeats the Ashura-kai...?{F801}{F802}The Ring of Gaea wouldn't spare the{F801}life of anyone without any special{F801}skills like me, would they...?{F801}{F802}Ahhhhhhghhhh!
